snippet.title: Velocity 2X - Trailer (PS4/Vita) - Eurogamer
snippet.description:
Released in the first week of September, Velocity 2X is the sci-fi platformer and shoot ‘em-up in one adventure! This highly anticipated sequel to Velocity Ultra weaves together two classic game formats into one seamless adventure, featuring puzzle-platforming action alongside award-winning top-down shoot ‘em-up gameplay!

Subscribe to Eurogamer - http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=eurogamer

For the latest video game reviews, news and analysis, check out http://www.eurogamer.net and don't forget to follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/eurogamer
